sentence.text: However, the expression and precise role of SOX3 in osteosarcoma remain unclear.
To elucidate the cellular and molecular function of SOX3, we examined the consequences of SOX3 knockdown in osteosarcoma cells.
We found that the downregulation of SOX3 inhibited the proliferation, migration and invasion of osteosarcoma cells.
Taken together, our data indicate that SOX3 may serve as an oncogene in osteosarcoma, and SOX3 downregulation may prove to be a novel approach for the inhibition of osteosarcoma progression
